name: GeoNigma
description:
GeoNigma ... Work together to fill out the parts that are not there, and progress onwards in a world full of geometric puzzles and disorder...Go right ahead! grab two friends, three controllers and we promise a new and interesting cooperative experience!

Controls:

  • 3 controllers needed
  • Left joystick: move
  • A: Jump
  • RT: Special ability +
  • LT: Special ability -
  • O: Pause
